nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi Person1 I discussed with Dr Person2 -  The official recommendations are 6 months after the second dose. But he would advise the third shot now, and would recommend Pfizer or Moderna instead of J/J for the booster. You may get flu like symptoms for a day. Th anks, Person3
